    • Method Detail

      • registerPurchase

        public void registerPurchase(long customerID,
                    long productId)
        This method simulates a new purchase. Adds purchase to the purchases list. In real world scenario add them to database here using a web service call (ideally a REST based POST request)
        Specified by:
        registerPurchase in interface RelatedProducts
        Parameters:
        customerID - the id of the customer who made the purchase
        productId - the id of the product which was purchased

      • getRelatedProducts

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> getRelatedProducts(long customerID,
                                                     long productId,
                                                     int numProducts)
        This method first gets the list of all related customers ie all customers who bought the same product. It then goes through all purchases with that customers and checks if they have bought some other products. If the product is not already added in the final list it is added to it. This procedure continues numProducts times or if the entire list is searched and no more related products can be found.
        Specified by:
        getRelatedProducts in interface RelatedProducts
        Parameters:
        customerID - the id of the customer for which the related products are needed
        productId - the id of the product for which the related products are needed
        numProducts - the number of related products required
        Returns:
        Returns the list of next `numProducts` products related to this product

      • getRelatedCustomer

        public long getRelatedCustomer(long customerID,
                      long productID)
        getRelatedCustomer: Method checks the list of all purchases in which the product purchases was the same but the customer was different and returns the first such customer.
        Specified by:
        getRelatedCustomer in interface RelatedProducts
        Parameters:
        customerID - the id of the customer for which the related customer is needed
        productID - the id of the product for which the related customer is needed
        Returns:
        Returns the ID of a different customer who has also bought the productID

      • getAllRelatedCustomers

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> getAllRelatedCustomers(long customerID,
                                                         long productID)
        getAllRelatedCustomers: Method checks the list of all purchases in which the product purchases was the same but the customer was different and returns the entire list of such customers.
        Parameters:
        customerID - the id of the customer for which the related customers are needed
        productID - he id of the product for which the related customers are needed
        Returns:
        Returns the list of different customers who has also bought the productID
